title: DSA Level 6 — Recursion & Backtracking
concept: Recursion techniques: permutations, subsets, n-Queens, Sudoku, backtracking search.

challenges.title: Factorial Using Recursion
Fibonacci (Memoization)
challenges.description: Print the nth Fibonacci number using recursion with memoization.

challenges.title: Generate Subsets
challenges.description: Given an array of integers, generate all subsets (power set) in lexicographic order.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Each subset on a new line, elements space-separated. Print empty subset as an empty line.

challenges.title: Generate Permutations
challenges.description: Given an array of distinct integers, print all permutations in lexicographic order.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Second line: N distinct integers.
challenges.outputDescription: Each permutation on a new line, elements space-separated.

challenges.title: N-Queens
challenges.description: Place N queens on an N×N chessboard such that no two queens attack each other. Print the number of valid arrangements.
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: count of valid configurations.

challenges.title: Rat in a Maze
challenges.description: Given an N×N maze of 0s and 1s, count the paths from (0,0) to (N-1,N-1) moving only right or down through cells with value 1.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: N. Next N lines: N integers (0 or 1).
challenges.outputDescription: Single integer: number of possible paths.

challenges.title: Sudoku Solver
challenges.description: Fill a 9×9 Sudoku grid so each row, column and 3×3 subgrid has digits 1–9 exactly once.
challenges.inputDescription: 9 lines, each with 9 integers (0–9) where 0 means empty.
challenges.outputDescription: Solved 9×9 Sudoku grid (9 lines of 9 integers).

challenges.title: Word Search Grid
challenges.description: Given a grid of letters and a target word, return YES if the word exists by moving to adjacent cells (up, down, left, right) without reusing a cell.
challenges.inputDescription: First line: R C. Next R lines: C characters (no spaces). Last line: target word.

challenges.title: Print All Balanced Parentheses
challenges.description: Given N, print all valid combinations of N pairs of parentheses.
challenges.outputDescription: Each valid string on a separate line.

challenges.title: Knight’s Tour
challenges.description: Count possible knight’s tours on an N×N chessboard starting from (0,0).
